Hi,
I was able to reproduce the above error on two different machines. The error went away when I tried replacing torch.tensor(0, dtype=torch.long) with torch.zeros(1) in the following lines:

pytorch/torch/nn/modules/batchnorm.py

Line 30 in 0fa69c0

self.register_buffer('num_batches_tracked', torch.tensor(0, dtype=torch.long))

pytorch/torch/nn/modules/batchnorm.py

Line 82 in 0fa69c0

state_dict[num_batches_tracked_key] = torch.tensor(0, dtype=torch.long)

So the issue is probably about torch.tensor(0, dtype=torch.long)?

body:
Hi,
I was able to reproduce the above error on two different machines. The error went away when I tried replacing `torch.tensor(0, dtype=torch.long)` with `torch.zeros(1)` in the following lines:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/0fa69c0276cde1542e19c721f538ba72777b19d4/torch/nn/modules/batchnorm.py#L30
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/0fa69c0276cde1542e19c721f538ba72777b19d4/torch/nn/modules/batchnorm.py#L82
So the issue is probably about `torch.tensor(0, dtype=torch.long)`?
